targets.rawSQL:
WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc(
      'week',
      COALESCE(
        TRY(from_iso8601_timestamp(data_hora_agendamento)),
        TRY(date_parse(data_hora_agendamento, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i'))
      )
    ) AS semana,
    UPPER(TRIM(status)) AS status
  FROM bb_flattened
  WHERE data_hora_agendamento IS NOT NULL
    AND status IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  semana AS data,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'ATIVO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Ativos",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'CONCLUÍDO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Concluídos",
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'CANCELADO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Cancelados"
FROM base
GROUP BY semana
ORDER BY semana;

panels.title: Agendamentos por Status

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  ROUND(AVG(CAST(duracao AS DOUBLE)), 2) AS duracao
FROM bb_flattened

panels.title: Duração Média do Serviço

targets.rawSQL:
WITH parsed AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(
      TRY(from_iso8601_timestamp(data_hora_agendamento)),
      TRY(date_parse(data_hora_agendamento, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i')),
      TRY(date_parse(data_hora_agendamento, '%d/%m/%Y'))
    ) AS ts,
    UPPER(TRIM(atraso)) AS atraso
  FROM bb_flattened
  WHERE data_hora_agendamento IS NOT NULL
    AND data_hora_agendamento <> ''
),
base AS (
  SELECT date_trunc('month', ts) AS mes, atraso
  FROM parsed
  WHERE ts IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  date_format(mes, '%Y-%m') AS mes_label,
  ROUND(
    100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN atraso = 'SIM' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*)
  , 2) AS "Percentual de Atrasos"
FROM base
GROUP BY mes
ORDER BY mes;

panels.title: Percentual de Atrasos dos Clientes por Mês

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  ROUND(
    100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN atraso = 'Sim' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*),
    2
  ) AS percentual_geral_atrasos
FROM bb_flattened
WHERE atraso IS NOT NULL;

panels.title: Percentual de Atrasos dos Clientes

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  ROUND(AVG(CAST(tempo_atraso_minutos AS DOUBLE)), 2) AS tempo_medio_atraso_minutos
FROM bb_flattened 
WHERE atraso = 'Sim';

panels.title: Tempo Médio de Atraso dos Clientes

targets.rawSQL:
WITH parsed AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(
      TRY(from_iso8601_timestamp(data_hora_agendamento)),
      TRY(date_parse(data_hora_agendamento, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i')),
      TRY(date_parse(data_hora_agendamento, '%d/%m/%Y'))
    ) AS ts,
    UPPER(TRIM(status)) AS status
  FROM bb_flattened
  WHERE data_hora_agendamento IS NOT NULL
    AND data_hora_agendamento <> ''
),
base AS (
  SELECT date_trunc('month', ts) AS mes, status
  FROM parsed
  WHERE ts IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  date_format(mes, '%Y-%m') AS mes_label,
  ROUND(
    100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'CANCELADO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*)
  , 2) AS "Percentual de Agendamentos Cancelados"
FROM base
GROUP BY mes
ORDER BY mes;

panels.title: Percentual de Agendamentos Cancelados por Mês

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  ROUND(
    100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'Cancelado' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*),
    2
  ) AS percentual_geral_cancelado
FROM bb_flattened
WHERE status IS NOT NULL;

panels.title: Percentual de Agendamentos Cancelados
Geral

targets.rawSQL:
WITH params AS (
  SELECT
    1.0  AS lim_chuva_mm,   -- precipitação ≥ 1.0 mm => Chuvoso
    32.0 AS lim_calor_c,    -- temperatura ≥ 32 °C   => Calor extremo
    10.0 AS lim_frio_c      -- temperatura ≤ 10 °C   => Frio extremo
),
parsed AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(
      TRY(from_iso8601_timestamp(f.data_hora_agendamento)),         
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i')),
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')),
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%Y-%m-%d'))
    ) AS ts,
    f.Precipitacao           AS precip_mm,
    f.Temperatura            AS temp_c,
    UPPER(f.status)          AS status_up
  FROM bb_flattened f
),
base AS (
  SELECT
    DATE(date_trunc('day', ts)) AS dt,
    precip_mm,
    temp_c,
    status_up,
    CASE
      WHEN precip_mm >= p.lim_chuva_mm THEN 'Chuvoso'
      WHEN temp_c   >= p.lim_calor_c   THEN 'Calor extremo'
      WHEN temp_c   <= p.lim_frio_c    THEN 'Frio extremo'
      ELSE 'Ensolarado'
    END AS tipo_clima
  FROM parsed
  CROSS JOIN params p
  WHERE ts IS NOT NULL
),
agg AS (
  SELECT
    tipo_clima,
    COUNT(*) AS total_agend,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status_up IN ('CANCELADO','CANCELADA') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cancelados
  FROM base
  GROUP BY tipo_clima
)
SELECT
  tipo_clima,
  ROUND(
    (CAST(cancelados AS DOUBLE) / NULLIF(total_agend, 0)) * 100,
    2
  ) AS "Percentual de Agendamentos Cancelados"
FROM agg
ORDER BY CASE tipo_clima
  WHEN 'Chuvoso'       THEN 1
  WHEN 'Calor extremo' THEN 2
  WHEN 'Frio extremo'  THEN 3
  ELSE 4
END;

panels.title: Taxa de Agendamentos Cancelados em Relação ao Clima

targets.rawSQL:
WITH params AS (
  SELECT
    1.0  AS lim_chuva_mm,
    34.0 AS lim_calor_c,
    10.0 AS lim_frio_c
),
parsed AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(
      TRY(from_iso8601_timestamp(f.data_hora_agendamento)),
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i')),
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')),
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%Y-%m-%d'))
    ) AS ts,
    CAST(f.Precipitacao AS DOUBLE) AS precip_mm,
    CAST(f.Temperatura  AS DOUBLE) AS temp_c,
    NULLIF(TRIM(f.servico), '')     AS servico
  FROM bb_flattened f
),
classif AS (
  SELECT
    servico,
    CASE
      WHEN precip_mm >= p.lim_chuva_mm THEN 'Chuvoso'
      WHEN temp_c   >= p.lim_calor_c   THEN 'Calor'
      WHEN temp_c   <= p.lim_frio_c    THEN 'Frio'
      ELSE 'Ensolarado'
    END AS tipo_clima
  FROM parsed
  CROSS JOIN params p
  WHERE ts IS NOT NULL
    AND servico IS NOT NULL
),
agg AS (
  SELECT
    servico,
    SUM(CASE WHEN tipo_clima = 'Chuvoso'    THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS chuvoso,
    SUM(CASE WHEN tipo_clima = 'Calor'      THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS calor,
    SUM(CASE WHEN tipo_clima = 'Frio'       THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS frio,
    SUM(CASE WHEN tipo_clima = 'Ensolarado' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ensolarado
  FROM classif
  GROUP BY servico
)
SELECT
  servico,
  ensolarado AS "Ensolarado",
  chuvoso AS "Chuvoso",
  calor AS "Calor (>= 34°C)",
  frio AS "Frio (<= 10°C)"
FROM agg
ORDER BY (chuvoso + calor + frio + ensolarado) DESC;

panels.title: Serviços Utilizados por Tipo de Clima

targets.rawSQL:
WITH parsed AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(
      TRY(from_iso8601_timestamp(f.data_hora_agendamento)),
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i'))
    ) AS ts,
    TRIM(f.status) AS status_up
  FROM bb_flattened f
  WHERE f.status IS NOT NULL
),
base AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('month', ts) AS mes,
    date_format(date_trunc('month', ts), '%Y-%m') AS mes_label,
    status_up
  FROM parsed
  WHERE ts IS NOT NULL
),
agg AS (
  SELECT
    mes,
    mes_label,
    COUNT(*) AS total_agend,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status_up = 'Cancelado' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cancelados
  FROM base
  GROUP BY mes, mes_label
)
SELECT
  mes AS time,
  ROUND((CAST(cancelados AS DOUBLE) / NULLIF(total_agend, 0)) * 100, 2) AS "Percentual de Agendamentos Cancelados"
FROM agg
ORDER BY mes;

panels.title: Variação da Taxa de Cancelamentos ao Longo do Tempo

targets.rawSQL:
WITH parsed AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(
      TRY(from_iso8601_timestamp(f.data_hora_agendamento)),
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i'))
    ) AS ts,
    CAST(f.Temperatura AS DOUBLE) AS temp_c
  FROM bb_flattened f
  WHERE f.Temperatura IS NOT NULL
),
agg AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('month', ts) AS periodo,
    AVG(temp_c) AS temp_media,
    MIN(temp_c) AS temp_min,
    MAX(temp_c) AS temp_max
  FROM parsed
  WHERE ts IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  periodo AS time,
  ROUND(temp_media, 2) AS "Temperatura Média (°C)",
  ROUND(temp_min,   2) AS "Temperatura Mínima (°C)",
  ROUND(temp_max,   2) AS "Temperatura Máxima (°C)"
FROM agg
ORDER BY time;

panels.title: Variação de Temperatura ao Longo do Tempo

targets.rawSQL:
WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    NULLIF(TRIM(f.servico), '') AS servico,
    TRY_CAST(f.temperatura AS DOUBLE)  AS temperatura,
    TRY_CAST(f.precipitacao AS DOUBLE) AS precipitacao
  FROM bb_flattened f
  WHERE f.servico IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  servico,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) AS percentual_servico
FROM base
WHERE servico IS NOT NULL
  AND temperatura BETWEEN 10 AND 33
  AND precipitacao < 1
GROUP BY servico
ORDER BY percentual_servico DESC;

panels.title: Serviços Consultados em Dias de Tempo Estável

targets.rawSQL:
WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    NULLIF(TRIM(f.servico), '') AS servico,
    TRY_CAST(f.temperatura AS DOUBLE)  AS temperatura,
    TRY_CAST(f.precipitacao AS DOUBLE) AS precipitacao
  FROM bb_flattened f
  WHERE f.servico IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  servico,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) AS percentual_servico
FROM base
WHERE servico IS NOT NULL
  AND temperatura >= 33
GROUP BY servico
ORDER BY percentual_servico DESC;

panels.title: Serviços Consultados em Clima Quente (>32°C)

targets.rawSQL:
WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    NULLIF(TRIM(f.servico), '') AS servico,
    TRY_CAST(f.temperatura AS DOUBLE)  AS temperatura,
    TRY_CAST(f.precipitacao AS DOUBLE) AS precipitacao
  FROM bb_flattened f
  WHERE f.servico IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  servico,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) AS percentual_servico
FROM base
WHERE servico IS NOT NULL
  AND temperatura <= 10
GROUP BY servico
ORDER BY percentual_servico DESC;

panels.title: Serviços Consultados em Clima Frio (<11°C)

targets.rawSQL:
WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    NULLIF(TRIM(f.servico), '') AS servico,
    TRY_CAST(f.temperatura AS DOUBLE)  AS temperatura,
    TRY_CAST(f.precipitacao AS DOUBLE) AS precipitacao
  FROM bb_flattened f
  WHERE f.servico IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  servico,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) AS percentual_servico
FROM base
WHERE servico IS NOT NULL
  AND precipitacao >= 1
GROUP BY servico
ORDER BY percentual_servico DESC;

panels.title: Serviços Consultados em Dias de Chuva (>1 mm)
Clima/Tempo

targets.rawSQL:
WITH parsed AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(
      TRY(from_iso8601_timestamp(f.data_hora_agendamento)),
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i')),
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')),
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%Y-%m-%d'))
    ) AS ts,
    UPPER(f.status) AS status_up,
    f.feriado
  FROM bb_flattened f
  WHERE f.status IS NOT NULL
),
base AS (
  SELECT
    DATE(date_trunc('day', ts)) AS data_agendamento,
    status_up,
    feriado
  FROM parsed
  WHERE ts IS NOT NULL
),
feriados AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT data_agendamento AS data_feriado
  FROM base
  WHERE feriado = 'Sim'
),
classificado AS (
  SELECT
    b.data_agendamento,
    b.status_up,
    CASE
      WHEN b.feriado = 'Sim' THEN 'Feriado'
      WHEN DATE_ADD('day', 1, b.data_agendamento) IN (SELECT data_feriado FROM feriados)
           THEN 'Véspera de feriado'
      ELSE 'Dia útil'
    END AS tipo_dia
  FROM base b
),
agg AS (
  SELECT
    tipo_dia,
    COUNT(*) AS total_agend,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status_up IN ('CANCELADO','CANCELADA') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cancelados
  FROM classificado
  GROUP BY tipo_dia
)
SELECT
  tipo_dia,
  ROUND((CAST(cancelados AS DOUBLE) / NULLIF(total_agend, 0)) * 100, 2)
    AS "Percentual Agendamentos de Cancelamentos"
FROM agg
ORDER BY CASE tipo_dia
  WHEN 'Feriado' THEN 1
  WHEN 'Véspera de feriado' THEN 2
  WHEN 'Dia útil' THEN 3
  ELSE 4
END;

panels.title: Taxa de Agendamentos Cancelados em Relação aos Feriados

targets.rawSQL:
WITH parsed AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(
      TRY(from_iso8601_timestamp(f.data_hora_agendamento)),
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i'))
    ) AS ts,
    TRIM(f.status) AS status_up
  FROM bb_flattened f
  WHERE f.status IS NOT NULL
),
base AS (
  SELECT
    day_of_week(ts) AS dia_semana_num,
    status_up
  FROM parsed
  WHERE ts IS NOT NULL AND day_of_week(ts) <> 7
),
agg AS (
  SELECT
    dia_semana_num,
    COUNT(*) AS total_agend,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status_up = 'Cancelado' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cancelados
  FROM base
  GROUP BY dia_semana_num
)
SELECT
  CASE dia_semana_num
    WHEN 1 THEN 'Segunda-feira'
    WHEN 2 THEN 'Terça-feira'
    WHEN 3 THEN 'Quarta-feira'
    WHEN 4 THEN 'Quinta-feira'
    WHEN 5 THEN 'Sexta-feira'
    WHEN 6 THEN 'Sábado'
  END AS dia_semana,
  ROUND((CAST(cancelados AS DOUBLE) / NULLIF(total_agend, 0)) * 100, 2) AS "Percentual de Agendamento Cancelados"
FROM agg
ORDER BY dia_semana_num;

panels.title: Taxa de Agendamentos Cancelados em Relação ao Dias da Semana

targets.rawSQL:
WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    CASE 
      WHEN LOWER(TRIM(feriado)) = 'sim' THEN 'Feriados'
      ELSE 'Dias comuns'
    END AS grupo,
    CASE 
      WHEN LOWER(TRIM(atraso)) = 'sim' THEN 'Atrasos'
      ELSE 'Não atrasos'
    END AS tipo_atraso
  FROM bb_flattened
  WHERE feriado IS NOT NULL
    AND atraso IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  grupo,
  SUM(CASE WHEN tipo_atraso = 'Atrasos' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Com Atrasos",
  SUM(CASE WHEN tipo_atraso = 'Não atrasos' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Sem Atrasos"
FROM base
GROUP BY grupo
ORDER BY CASE grupo WHEN 'Feriados' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END;

panels.title: Agendamentos com Atrasos

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN atraso = 'Sim' THEN 'Atrasos'
    ELSE 'Sem atrasos'
  END AS tipo_atraso,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) AS percentual
FROM bb_flattened
WHERE feriado = 'Sim'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY percentual DESC;

panels.title: Percentual de Atrasos nos Feriados

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN atraso = 'Sim' THEN 'Atrasos'
    ELSE 'Sem atrasos'
  END AS tipo_atraso,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) AS percentual
FROM bb_flattened
WHERE feriado = 'Não'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY percentual DESC;

panels.title: Percentual de Atrasos nos Dias Letivos

targets.rawSQL:
WITH parsed AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(
      TRY(from_iso8601_timestamp(f.data_hora_agendamento)),
      TRY(date_parse(f.data_hora_agendamento, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i'))
    ) AS ts,
    TRIM(f.status) AS status_up
  FROM bb_flattened f
  WHERE f.data_hora_agendamento IS NOT NULL
),
base AS (
  SELECT
    ts,
    status_up,
    CASE
      WHEN (month(ts) = 6 AND day_of_month(ts) >= 20)
        OR (month(ts) = 7)
        OR (month(ts) = 8 AND day_of_month(ts) <= 1)
        OR (month(ts) = 12 AND day_of_month(ts) >= 15)
        OR (month(ts) = 1  AND day_of_month(ts) <= 27)
      THEN 'Férias escolares'
      ELSE 'Período Letivo'
    END AS grupo
  FROM parsed
  WHERE ts IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  grupo,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN status_up = 'Cancelado' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 2)  AS "Cancelados (%)",
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN status_up <> 'Cancelado' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 2) AS "Não cancelados (%)"
FROM base
GROUP BY grupo
ORDER BY CASE grupo WHEN 'Férias escolares' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END;

panels.title: Percentual de Cancelamento em Período Letivo e nas Férias Escolares

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  TRIM(servico) AS servico,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) AS percentual
FROM bb_flattened
WHERE feriado = 'Sim'
GROUP BY servico
ORDER BY percentual DESC;

panels.title: Serviços Consultados em Feriados

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  TRIM(servico) AS servico,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) AS percentual
FROM bb_flattened
WHERE feriado = 'Não'
GROUP BY servico
ORDER BY percentual DESC;

panels.title: Serviços Consultados em Dias Letivos
Feriados
